entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 22.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 30 with temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
